1: Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think. (1.1)
2: Hatred can never put an end to hatred; love alone can. This is an unalterable law. (1.5)
3: People forget that their lives will end soon. For those who remember, quarrels come to an end. (1.6)
4: The wise, knowing what is trivial and what is vital, set their thoughts on the supreme goal and attain the highest knowledge. (1.12)
5: Those who know few scriptures yet practice their teachings live with a pure mind in the highest wisdom. (1.20)
6: Those who strive earnestly will go beyond death; those who do not can never come to life. (2.21)
7: If you meditate earnestly, through spiritual disciplines you can make an island for yourself that no flood can overwhelm. (2.25)
8: The earnest spiritual aspirant advances like a fire. Such seekers will never fall back; they are nearing nirvana. (2.31)
9: An undisciplined mind does greater harm than all your enemies. (3.42)
10: The wise live without injuring nature, as the bee drinks nectar without harming the flower. (4.49)
11: Do not give your attention to what others do or fail to do; give it to what you do or fail to do. (4.50)
12: Long is the cycle of birth and death to those who know not the dharma. (5.60)
13: If you find no one to support you on the spirital path, walk alone. (5.61)
15: With their senses at peace and minds full of joy, the wise make the forests holy. (7.99)
16: One who conquers himself is greater than another who conquers a thousand times a thousand men on the battlefield. (8.103)
17: When you attain victory over yourself, not even the gods can turn it into defeat. (8.105)
18: It is better to live in virtue and wisdom for one day than to live a hundred years with an evil and undisciplined mind. (8.110)
19: One day's glimpse of the deathless state is better than a hundred years of life without it. (8.114)
20: Goodness does not grow old with the passage of time. (11.151)
21: With yourself well controlled, you gain a master very hard to find. (12.160)
22: Look on the world as a bubble; look on it as a mirage. Then the King of Death cannot even see you. (13.170)
23: Better than being lord of all the worlds is one step taken on the path to nirvana. (13.178)
